hero.name: Welcome i'm Tristan Vigneron
hero.subtitle: Code, design and digital aesthetics
hero.tagline: I design complete experiences, from server to screen, turning ideas into interfaces.

intro.hello: I'm Tristan Vigneron, a passionate software developer with a strong interest in video games and a deep love for crafting sleek digital experiences.
intro.path: After several years working in the world of pastry, I decided to challenge myself with a new journey — programming.
intro.strengths: I specialize in modern front-end development using Angular and TypeScript, where I focus on creating clean, scalable interfaces with a strong emphasis on user experience. On the backend, I work with Node.js and Express to build fast, efficient APIs, and I've also developed applications using Java with Spring Boot. Additionally, I have experience with PHP and Symfony. I thrive in the JavaScript ecosystem, where flexibility, creativity, and technical depth intersect.
